mapper.update: /** updateAnalysisTimeoutError : 실행 시간이 초과된 분석을 오류 처리한다. */ UPDATE SEEK_ANALYSIS SET ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD = 'ERROR', ANALYSIS_END_DT = NOW() WHERE ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD = 'PROCESSING' AND NOW() - MAKE_INTERVAL(MINS => #{maxMinutes}) > ANALYSIS_START_DT
mapper.sql: SELECT a.ANALYSIS_ID, a.ANALYSIS_TYPE_CCD, a.ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD, a.ANALYSIS_MODEL, a.ANALYSIS_START_DT, a.ANALYSIS_END_DT, a.ANALYSIS_TIME, a.CREATE_DT, ap.OPERATION_ID, ap.OPERATION_TYPE_CCD, ap.URL, ap.HEADER, ap.QUERY_STRING, ap.BODY, ap.FILE_ID, ad.TARGET_INFORMATION, ad.CONTENT FROM SEEK_ANALYSIS a LEFT JOIN SEEK_ANALYSIS_PROXY ap ON a.ANALYSIS_ID = ap.ANALYSIS_ID AND a.ANALYSIS_TYPE_CCD = 'PROXY' LEFT JOIN SEEK_ANALYSIS_DATABASE ad ON a.ANALYSIS_ID = ad.ANALYSIS_ID AND a.ANALYSIS_TYPE_CCD = 'DATABASE'
mapper.select:
/** selectAnalysisListToExecuted : 실행하려는 분석 정보 목록을 조회한다. */ WITH PROCESSING AS ( /* 현재 진행중인 분석 요청을 포함하여 분석기 서버에 요청할 수 있는 최대(스레드) 수 만큼 조회 */ SELECT COALESCE(#{maxCount} - COUNT(1), 0) AS SEL_COUNT FROM SEEK_ANALYSIS WHERE ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD = 'PROCESSING' )
WHERE a.ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD = 'WAIT' ORDER BY a.CREATE_DT LIMIT ( SELECT CASE WHEN 0 > SEL_COUNT THEN 0 ELSE SEL_COUNT END FROM PROCESSING )
mapper.insert: /** insertAnalysis : 분석 정보를 등록한다. */ INSERT INTO SEEK_ANALYSIS ( ANALYSIS_ID, ANALYSIS_TYPE_CCD, ANALYSIS_STATUS_CCD, ANALYSIS_MODEL, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{analysisId}, #{analysisTypeCcd}, #{analysisStatusCcd}, #{analysisModel}, NOW() )

/** insertAnalysisProxy : 분석 프록시 정보를 등록한다. */ INSERT INTO SEEK_ANALYSIS_PROXY ( ANALYSIS_ID, OPERATION_ID, OPERATION_TYPE_CCD, URL, HEADER, QUERY_STRING, BODY, FILE_ID ) VALUES ( #{analysisId}, #{operationId}, #{analysisStatusCcd}, #{url}, #{header}, #{queryString}, #{body}, #{fileId} )
